channel.title: Does anyone else have this issue?
channel.description:
So right before i go to sleep i check the server everything looks good, next day i wake up and see that the server just stops, dces.. I know this happens because all i see are the people online over and over again.
What gives? Why is this happening and is there a way to fix it?

item.title: Does anyone else have this issue?
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

[quote=“bhpkyeah, post:7, topic:188384”]YUP MARC that brings another issue, when i use the auto starter voule, it works but sometimes, it says port already in use? so then the server is off.[/quote]Yea, that used to happen to me when I had a server…it happens randomly right?

I was wondering why too

Set the voule auto restarter to about 10 minutes…should help

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone else have this issue?
